dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 79 x 61 cm (31 1/8 x 24 in.)
Repeat H: 31 cm (12 3/16 in.)
title: Quilt
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description: Complete quilt of copperplate printed cotton, with a design in red on a white ground. The design shows men and women dancing in the yard outside a cottage, a windmill, and boys riding in a hay wagon. A horse is bearing sacks on its back with the initials "WC". The quilt is lined with polychrome printed cottons in patchwork.
name: Quilt
